title: Is there really HIV in some of the vaccines for COVID-19?
description: Answer (1 of 6): is there really HIV in some of the vaccines for Covid-19? Yes and no, although more no than yes. The vaccine that was being developed by University of Queensland used a protein (gp41) that was extracted from HIV. This protein is not HIV in the same sense that a leather shoe is ...
